sentences.en: 'I've never loved, I mean I've never stopped loving, my mother. '' Was that a Freudian slip?'
sentences.cn: “ 我从没爱过, 我是说我从没停止爱过我母亲. ” “这是口误,还是你的真实想法? ”

sentences.en: Among them, Freudian analytical psychology drastically altered people's conception of human nature.
sentences.cn: 其中, 弗洛伊德的精神分析法改变了人们对人性的认识.

sentences.en: As a novelist, Stefan Zweig was influenced by Freudian psychoanalytical theories.
sentences.cn: 茨威格的小说创作受到了弗洛伊德心理学理论的影响.

sentences.en: Because hypnosis is not anything new, it is far older than Freudian psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 因为催眠并不是什么新鲜玩意, 它比弗洛伊德的精神分析学要久远的多.

sentences.en: Cognitive therapy approach focus on more present psychological condition of patients than Freudian psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 心理疗法比弗洛伊德疗法更注重病人的心理条件.

sentences.en: Cognitive therapy approach is more effective than Freudian psychoanalysis in analyzing patients'symptoms.
sentences.cn: 认知疗法在分析病人症状方面要比弗洛伊德心理分析更加有效.

sentences.en: Freudian psychoanalysis explained his trouble as Oedipus complex.
sentences.cn: 弗洛伊德精神分析学将他的困扰解释为恋母情节.

sentences.en: He was a strict, old-school Freudian.
sentences.cn: 他是个不折不扣、传统守旧的弗洛伊德学说信奉者。

sentences.en: In this way , Ramachandran says, the left hemisphere manifestly employs Freudian mechanisms of defense.
sentences.cn: 拉玛钱德朗说, 左大脑半球显然运用著佛洛伊德学说的[防卫机制].

sentences.en: Many current psychoanalytic theories diverge markedly from classical Freudian dogma.
sentences.cn: 许多现行的心理分析理论和古典弗洛伊德教条差别很大.

sentences.en: The English anthropologist , Geoffrey Gorer , sees the whole situation in Freudian terms.
sentences.cn: 英国的人类学家杰弗里·戈罗尔用弗罗伊德的说法来解释这一切.

sentences.en: They are committed, not just to psychology general, but to Freudian psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 他们通常不只局限于心理学, 而是要使用弗洛伊德的心理分析.

sentences.en: They are committed, not just to psychology in general, but to Freudian psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 他们所信奉的不只是一般的心理学方法, 而是弗洛伊德的精神分析法.

sentences.en: This procedure implies opposition to the revisionist Neo - Freudian school.
sentences.cn: 这种作法也意味着我们与修正主义的新弗洛伊德主义是相对立的.

sentences.en: You really think I brewed up some sort of Freudian fratricidal mania built around your success?
sentences.cn: 你真的认为我对你的成功存在某种佛洛伊德所说的同族互杀癖 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: [医]弗洛伊德〔学说〕的：关于弗洛伊德心理学说和心理疗法（精神分析学说和方法）的
